title: Entertainment Live: Glastonbury preparations, new Spider-Man reaction - BBC News
summary: news and updates for wednesday , 24 june 2015 .
festival attendees descend on glastonbury site .
sir lenny henry fluffs lines during educating rita .
taylor swift plays sell-out concert in glasgow .

documents.title: full time whistle
text: that 's your lot on today 's entertainment live page , but we 'll be back bright and early on thursday with more glastonbury news and a first-night report on new west end musical bend it like beckham .
it 's a show of two halves , apparently .
see you tomorrow .
author: Neil Smith
Arts reporter

documents.title: bricking it at glastonbury
text: in case it might have passed you by , a major music festival is happening this weekend .
to mark the event , legoland has set up its own mini-glastonbury scene - complete with pyramid stage .
this year 's headliners - florence welch , kanye west and the who 's roger daltry - are all featured in the exhibit which took 720 hours to build , using around 10,000 bricks .
florence sports a white suit similar to the one she wore at coachella , while kanye flashes some bling around his neck .
festival-goers also get to swim in the mud at lego glastonbury .
foo fighters had to cancel their headline set after dave grohl fell off stage and broke his leg .
here , though , the us singer still gets a place in the vip lounge to enjoy the show .
he 'll be in pieces if he carries on like that .

documents.title: game of thrones season six news
text: spoiler alert
do n't read anymore if you do n't want to know about season six .
we mean it .
stop reading now !
if you 're still with us , game of thrones fan site watcher on the wall has revealed casting news for the next series .
castings are underway and producers are specifically looking for either irish or northern irish residents to fill about 17 roles .
some of them include :
lord of noble northern house : a savage warrior , must be at least 180cm tall .
qhogo and akrat : young warriors with swagger and linguistic bravado , must speak in a fictional language .
legendary fighter : he carries a hugely famous sword on his back , must be a very impressive swordsman .
and the role almost anyone can do - green recruit : a young man with one line and one day of filming in august .

documents.title: ker-ching !
text: remember the guitar we mentioned earlier - the one that used to belong to coldplay 's chris martin ?
well , it 's been sold at auction for £ 18,750 - almost £ 10,000 more than it was expected to .

documents.title: merchant goes mental ( ist )
text: here are some snaps of extras star stephen merchant and welsh actor steffan rhodri in rehearsal for their new west end play the mentalists .

written by richard bean , of one man , two guvnors fame , it 's a comedy about an idealistic if possibly troubled man who recruits his best friend to help him spread the word about his plan to change the world .
the play starts previewing on 3 july at the wyndham 's theatre in london , by which time they 'll presumably have worked out how to get those cigarettes lit .

documents.title: throat surgery strikes again
text: nickelback have cancelled their summer tour of north america after lead singer chad kroeger was diagnosed with a cyst on his vocal cords .
he will have surgery in three weeks ' time and will have to take a rest afterwards , the band said .
they recorded a message apologising to fans , but said they hoped to be able to keep their europe tour dates later this year .
kroeger joins a list of singers who have cancelled dates recently due to operations on their pipes , including jess glynne and sam smith .
read more on this story .

documents.title: belfast 's museum of the year contender
text: we 're continuing our rundown of the museums shortlisted for museum of the year 2015 , which celebrates the best museums and galleries across the uk .
today we 're profiling the mac ( metropolitan arts centre ) in belfast , which has established itself as northern ireland 's leading contemporary arts venue since it opened in 2012 .
the winner will be announced on 1 july .

documents.title: in the lions ' lair
text: a host of stars have descended on cannes this week - not for another film festival , but for the cannes lions festival of creativity .
even kim kardashian is making an appearance , talking about `` hollywood and trends in digital storytelling '' .
organisers have been tweeting the highlights every day .

documents.title: when harry met arthur
text: the real-life friendship between the magician and escapologist harry houdini and sir arthur conan doyle , creator of sherlock holmes , is to be the basis of a new 10-part drama from itv .
houdini and doyle , to be broadcast on itv 's encore channel and on fox in the us , will see the couple join forces to solve inexplicable crimes that have been outfoxing scotland yard .

episodes star stephen mangan will play conan doyle , while houdini will be played by michael weston , an american actor who 's been seen in two us shows - elementary and house - with sherlock holmes connections .
canada 's rebecca liddiard and our own tim mcinnerny co-star in the series , to start shooting in manchester and toronto during the summer .

documents.title: love and marriage
text: we 've been hearing good things about 45 years , a new british drama about an ageing couple whose marriage is put under strain on the eve of their 45th wedding anniversary by news that rocks the very foundations on which their life together is built .

sir tom courtenay and charlotte rampling both won awards at the berlin film festival in february and are being tipped for further accolades for their roles in andrew haigh 's acclaimed third feature .
watch the trailer for the film , out in the uk on 28 august .

documents.title: and the award goes to
text: adrian villar rojas wins 2015 # prixcanson

documents.title: the glasto fun begins
text: speaking of glastonbury , fans are arriving in their droves at worthy farm .
some look like they 're in it for the long haul .
nothing will stop some revellers being there - even a broken leg !
but everyone seems to be settling in quite quickly .
even if they are struggling with their tents .

documents.title: how glastonbury are you ?
text: think you 're an expert on all things glastonbury ?
have a go at bbc music 's quiz and see how much you know about the festival .

documents.title: knight honoured by music charity
text: gladys knight 's name has been added to the list of silver clef recipients ahead of its annual ceremony next week .
the veteran singer said she was `` thrilled and honoured '' to be receiving the raymond weil international award from music therapy charity nordoff robbins .
knight had a smash hit in 1973 with midnight train to georgia with her backing band the pips and went on to record the stirring theme tune to the james bond film licence to kill .
duran duran , kasabian , rita ora and iron maiden will also be honoured at this year 's bash , to be held at london 's grosvenor house hotel on 3 july .

documents.title: uk weekend box office
text: figures : 19 to 21 june .
source : rentrak .

documents.title: guitar for sale : one careful owner
text: chris martin 's first acoustic guitar , which he used during the recording of coldplay 's debut album parachutes , is going under the hammer later .
the singer bought the instrument in devon and took with him to university in london where the band got together .
the case even has martin 's address and phone number on it - though the crucial info has all been scrubbed off now , so no chance of adding it to your address book .
you 'll need deep pockets to buy it , as the guitar is expected to fetch around £ 9,000 at bonhams ' auction in london .

documents.title: henry overcomes first night nerves
text: the newly ennobled sir lenny henry nearly came a cropper on tuesday after losing his way during a speech his character was giving in the chichester festival theatre 's revival of educating rita .
`` i 'm sorry , i 've completely gone , '' he told the audience
co-star lashana lynch was left alone on stage while henry composed himself .
once he returned , though , he `` recovered his footing to see through the first act '' - at least according to the telegraph 's claire allfree .
overall ,
letts , meanwhile , applauded the `` remarkable calmness '' with which henry handled his fluff and found lynch `` greatly affecting '' in the part so famously portrayed by julie walters .
educating rita by willy russell continues at the minerva theatre in chichester until 25 july .

documents.title: diesel power
text: here 's action man vin diesel , playing up for the cameras at the unveiling of a new fast & furious themed ride at universal studios in hollywood .
co-stars michelle rodriguez , jason statham and tyrese gibson were also on hand to lend the supercharged attraction some of their celebrity wattage .
gibson brought along seven-year-old daughter shayla to check out the spectacle , which opens its doors to the general public on thursday .

documents.title: taylor swift on woman 's hour
text: `` how did a relatively unexciting , slightly country pop moppet grow up to take on the might of apple , drag half the western world 's adolescents through all their youthful suffering and shake it off , all apparently before breakfast ? ''

that was what woman 's hour host jane garvey was pondering earlier as she devoted a sizeable chunk of the radio 4 programme to taylor swift , the pop star whose name has been on everyone 's lips this week .

documents.title: japan lifts 'footloose ban '
text: japan has lifted a 67-year-old ban on dancing , to the delight of the nation 's clubbers .
the ban forbids public dancing unless the venue has a license , and even licensed premises have to stop all dancing by midnight .
the footloose-like law was put into place after world war two to crack down on dance halls , often a hotbed for prostitution .
the new law was ratified last week and will come into force next year .
until then , late night dancing will remain illegal .
author: The Independent

documents.title: misery has new company
text: the die hard action man is still on course to play paul sheldon , the romantic novelist held hostage in the home of his `` number one fan '' .
it 's been announced , though , that house of cards star elizabeth marvel will no longer be playing the psychotic annie wilkes due to `` scheduling conflicts '' .
the role will now be played by laurie metcalf , an emmy-winning star of stage and screen best known for playing rosanne barr 's sister jackie in the sitcom roseanne .
kathy bates famously won an oscar for playing annie in the 1990 film version of king 's bestseller , in which james caan played the paul shedon role .

documents.title: graham 's plans for retirement
text: we all love a bit of graham norton on a friday night .
but the presenter has hinted he may wrap up his chat show within the next eight years , before he turns 60 .
speaking with his bbc radio 2 co-presenter maria mcerlane at an event in london to promote his memoir , the 52-year-old said he planned to get out of tv while he was still at the top of his game .
you want to get out when people are still watching your show .
you do n't want it to be when people say : 'that is still on , that is still a thing ? '
the thing no one wants is the inching backwards , where you 're kind of going : 'yes , the cast of towie can come on . '
i 'm not jumping tomorrow but it is in my head .
author: Daily Mirror

documents.title: new order album
text: new order are to release their first full studio album in 10 years in september .
bassist peter hook left the band acrimoniously in 2007 , so this marks the first studio album without him .
music complete will see keyboardist gillian gilbert return to record her first album with the band since 2001 .
according to the
long-term collaborator peter saville will once again be responsible for producing the album 's sleeve art .

documents.title: bottoms everywhere
text: in what surely sounds like a dream come true , the royal shakespeare company has invited 14 amateur theatre companies to join its professional cast on a uk tour of a midsummer night 's dream .
over 12 weeks , 84 amateur actors will play the mechanicals , the bungling labourers who provide much of the play 's comedy .
becky morris , from ashfield in nottinghamshire , is one of two women playing bottom on the tour .
`` it 's a gift of a part because the lines are so funny and there 's a lot of physical theatre , '' she said .
`` i 've been in plays where the audience has numbered no more than 19 .
capacity at the nottingham theatre royal is about 1,200 , so i have no idea what that 's going to be like . ''
the rsc 's erica whyman , who will direct , said shakespeare 's magical comedy was `` a very affectionate and fitting way to celebrate amateur actors everywhere '' .
read the full story
author: Tim Masters
Arts and Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: glastonbury weather update
text: curse you , british weather !
the current forecast predicts rain on friday and sunday .

documents.title: geena davis at the bfi
text: hollywood actress geena davis is to be the keynote speaker on gender equality in film and tv at the british film institute ( bfi ) in london later this year .
the speech on 8 october will be part of the bfi london film festival and is a collaboration with the geena davis institute on gender in media and women in film and television .
`` media images have a huge impact on our perceptions , and on our social and cultural beliefs and behaviours , '' said the thelma and louise star .
`` our new global study explores how global films may be reinforcing negative gender stereotypes with movie audiences of all ages . ''
sarah gavron 's film suffragette , starring meryl streep , helena bonham carter and carey mulligan , will open the festival on the day before davis makes her speech .

documents.title: swift rocks glasgow
text: the 25-year-old pop star endeared herself to a sell-out crowd at the sse hydro by mentioning her family 's scottish roots and declaring she was `` proud '' to be `` one of you '' .
the independent 's critic left mightily impressed , calling the concert ``
but
taylor-mania spreads to bbc radio 4 later as the woman 's hour team take a look at swift 's power and influence in the music industry .

do you think tom holland will make a good spider-man ?

and are you heading down to glastonbury today ?
if so get in touch and send us of your journey/your tent/your wellies .

author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: cameron salutes 'good friend ' horner
text: james cameron and his avatar producing partner jon landau have paid tribute to composer james horner following his death in a plane crash this week .
`` the avatar community has lost one of our great creative lights with the passing of james horner , '' they said in a statement .
`` james ' music was the air under the banshees ' wings , the ancient song of the forest , and the heartbeat of eywa .
`` we have lost not only a great teammate and collaborator , but a good friend , '' their statement continued .

`` james 's music affected the heart because his heart was so big , it infused every cue with deep emotional resonance , whether soaring in majesty through the floating mountains , or crying for the loss of nature 's innocence under bulldozer treads .
`` the beauty and power of avatar lay not just in the superb performances and the visual splendour , but in the music that made us cry and exult along with our characters .
irayo , james .
fly brother . ''
cameron , above with horner and singer leona lewis in 2009 , has also been
`` we only worked together three times , and each time it was a decade apart , '' he said .
`` if i thought maybe there was something that was n't supporting the he could turn on a dime and make it work . ''

documents.title: happy wednesday
text: greetings to one and all as we begin another up-to-the-minute rundown of all the news you 'll need from the entertainment and arts world .

today we 'll be bringing you james cameron 's tribute to late composer james horner , reactions to tom holland 's casting as the new spider-man and reviews of the first uk date in taylor swift 's 1989 world tour .
stick with us and you will never , ever , ever have to go anywhere else .
if you missed what happened yesterday ,
author: Neil Smith
Arts reporter
